issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm is declared with 'extern' yet also defined in the same file. In contrast, the template and all other solution files use 'global fix_vec_sub_asm' when defining these functions. This conflicting symbol declaration will prevent proper linking and confuse students examining the reference solution.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the 'extern fix_vec_sub_asm' directive with 'global fix_vec_sub_asm' (or remove the extern) so that the definition is correctly exported and aligns with the template and other solution files.
